info.title: codes
info.description:
This is a system layer sevice which exposes an enterprise service to map between system codes and a common code topology.

#### Service Functionality
This API is called with several possible combinations of codes (system/common) and returns a standard JSON response structure which represents the mapping to other related information in the system mapping store.

#### Sequence Diagram
![Mapping](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/sd-codes.png)

#### Performance Expectation
Standard SLA applies.

#### Service Capacity Supported
Standard Capacity applies

#### Suggested Test Scenario
TBD

#### Service Availability
Standard Service Availability applies

#### Service Security
HTTPS/SSL

get.summary: map known code values to common structure
get.description: given known facts for a code, return the standard structure for mapping codes.

parameters.name: systemCode
parameters.description: The system for with the code to be mapped.

parameters.name: commonCodeName
parameters.description: The name for the code as defined for the enterprise code mapping.

parameters.name: systemCodeValue
parameters.description: The value of the system code to be mapped.  Either `systemCodeValue` or `commonCodeValue` is required to complete the mapping key.

parameters.name: commonCodeValue
parameters.description: The value of the common code to be mapped. Either `systemCodeValue` or `commonCodeValue` is required to complete the mapping key.
